data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Strawberry Hill, Oregon, USA (SH30)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Strawberry Hill, Oregon, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using StowAway XTI Temperature Loggers (Onset Computer Corp. XTI32-05+37) beginning 2004-07-09. The instrument depth was 004 meters, in an overall water depth of 30 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
